#summary The navigator.oscpu property
#labels about-dom,is-dom-property,from-mozilla

== Values ==

The `navigator.oscpu` property returns a string.

[BrowserFamilyFirefox Firefox] returns the operating system part of the [NavigatorUserAgentProperty navigator.userAgent] property.  Example: `"Windows NT 5.1"` on Microsoft Windows XP.

This property is read-only.
